pr_title: [risk=no][RW-4362] Remove classes and fields relating to the pre-verification institutional affiliation

timeline.message: Remove old-style inst-affile references from ProfileTargetProperty and ProfileAuditorTest
rm missing fields from DbStorageEnums and DemographicSurveyEnum
update ProfileService to remove old-inst-affil references
rm old-inst tests from ProfileControllerTest and ProfileServiceTest

timeline.bodyText: Waiting at least one release cycle before deleting this table
timeline.author: jmthibault79

timeline.bodyText: Surprised to see this here - I thought we collected all of these in DbStorageEnums
timeline.author: jmthibault79

replies.bodyText: Do we have equivalent or better coverage of the new stuff?

These are about lists of affiliations - no equivalent concept exists.
Equivalent feature coverage for the general concept of affiliation already exists
